p: Enrique Ortíz Flores was HIC’s Secretary General and President during 1988–1999 and 2003–2007 respectively. He was also advisor and civil servant to the Mexican government in 1982–1988, specifically in the National Fund for Popular Housing (Fonhapo in its Spanish acronym), and co-author of the first national housing programme in Mexico. He is an internationally recognized activist for the right to housing and the defence of the social production of habitat.
